text: (piṉṉar, iṟaivaṉ ātamai nōkki) ‘‘ātamē! Nīr umatu maṉaiviyuṭaṉ iccōlaiyil vacittirum. Nīṅkaḷ iruvarum virumpiya iṭattilellām (ceṉṟu virumpiyavaṟṟaiyellām) puciyuṅkaḷ. Eṉiṉum, inta marattiṉ camīpattilkūṭa nīṅkaḷ cellātīrkaḷ. (Avvāṟu ceṉṟāl) ataṉāl uṅkaḷukku nīṅkaḷē tīṅkiḻaittuk koṇṭavarkaḷāka ākiviṭuvīrkaḷ'' (eṉṟu kūṟiṉāṉ)
